title: Biden Should Say ‘We’ll Win’
sub_head: Reagan, Zelensky and Hitchcock provide lessons in the drama of war and diplomacy.
body:
As a mere theater writer, I don’t know how to resolve the Russian-Ukrainian war any more than the next guy. But I can spot something missing from the White House’s approach to solving the crisis: passion.
We often hear the phrase “that only happens in the movies.” Or “things are different in real life.” But do they have to be?
